channel.title: 562 Not loosing stuff in wilderness

item.title: 562 Not loosing stuff in wilderness
item.dc:creator: @skillingman8 skillingman8
item.description:
@skillingman8 wrote:

Heyy,

When i kill someone in my server in the “Wild” The people will not drop anything?

I’ve looked this up on google and found nothing, that i needed… So i have brought This question to the moparscape community.

Here is my player.java (after searching for) droploot,

@Override public void dropLoot(Player winner) { if(winner == null) { return; } if(rights == 2) { return; } if(!inClanWars()) { if(this.inSoulwars()) { return; } } if(inClanWars() && getLocation().getClanLevel() > 0 && getLocation().getZ() == 0) { List allItems = new ArrayList(); for(Item i : inventory.getContainer().getItems()) { if(i != null) { allItems.add(i); } } inventory.reset(); for(Item i : equipment.getContainer().getItems()) { if(i != null) { allItems.add(i); } } equipment.reset(); for(Item i : allItems) { for(int id : Halloween.COSTUME) { if(i.getId() == id) { continue; } } World.getWorld().getItemManager().createDropGroundItem(winner, getLocation(), i); } } } 
public void dropLoot2(Player winner) {

}</blockquote>

Read full topic
